title: LoopNetwork
author: LoopNetwork
content: Welcome To Loop Network (Super Scaling Blockchain)Why we need 'more' Scaling ?Scaling is not enough. While increasing their transaction throughput blockchains must retain two fundamental properties of blockchain technology: Decentralization and Security. This usually called the blockchain Trillema.We have developed a distributed ledger system that splits super-resolution images into patches, unlike the state of the art method, in this work each patch can be distributed to different nodes in this way the failed nodes cannot interfere with the system.Whitepaper: https://loopnetwork.gitbook.io/home/Website: https://www.theloopnetwork.org/Short Summary:...............................................Loop Network (Loop) Launched 31st January 2022...............................................- Stealth Launched with a Marketcap of $44- No VCÂ´s- Fixed Supply (200m)- Deflationary- Total BurnedÂ  : 19,303,952.90 [9.6520%]- Circulating now : 180,695,800.87...............................................Listed on:CMC: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/loopnetwork/markets/CG: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/loopnetworkCoinmooner: https://coinmooner.com/coin/loop-network-loopChainlist: https://chainlist.org/?search=15551Moontok: https://moontok.io/coins/loopnetwork...............................................CEX:(No Buy Tax)MEXCBitmartIndoexBiboxXT.ComDeepcoinDEX:Pancakeswap (10% Tax - 60% Developement/40% Marketing)...............................................Community:Twitter: https://twitter.com/LoopNetwork3?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5EauthorTelegram Channel: https://t.me/loopnetworkTelegram Language Channel:ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡³ - @loopnetworkchinaðŸ‡®ðŸ‡© - @loopnetworkindonesiaðŸ‡µðŸ‡­ - @loopnetworkphðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¦ - @loopnetworkarabðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª - @loopnetworkgermanðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ - @loopnetworkitaliaFollow our Community, we will answer all your Questions.
